data.text: Yuba yi a yabi, a naxa,
“N bata fala sifani ito mɛ dɔxɔ wuyaxi,
Danna fuyanten falani itoe ma ba?
N fan yi nɔɛ falan tiyɛ nɛn alo ɛ tan,
n yi ɛ sɛnbɛ soma nɛn n ma falane ra,
“Koni, n ma falane mi nɔɛ n tan madɛndɛnɲɛ n ma tɔrɔni.
Iki, Ala bata n sɛnbɛn ɲan yati!
A bata n fatin mafasa,
Ala n yibɔma a xɔlɔni,
Muxune e dɛni bima n xili ma,
Ala bata n so tinxintarene yii,
N yi bɔɲɛ xunbenla nin,
a xalimakuli wonle bata n nabilin.
A fama n xili ma alo sofana,
“N bata kasa bɛnbɛli dugin nagodo n ma sununi,
Wugan bata n yɛɛn gbeeli,
Anu, n mi fe ɲaxi yo ligaxi,
“I tan Bɔxɔna, n faxamatɔɔn ni i ra,
Iki yɛtɛni, serena nde n xa kore,
N xɔyine n magelema,
Na kanna Ala solonama muxun xa,
Koni, n ma siimayaan bata a danna li,
